title: What is the importance of statistics in the fields of science? - Quora

response.answer_text: One answer I like is that Statistics is “The Grammar of Science.” Karl Pearson, an early 20th century statistician (Pearson correlation is named for him) even wrote a book with that title. Another, if you define science like the Meme-friendly Steven Novella:  It’s easy to see that statistics fits within Science in a very tidy way. Statistics is exactly a consistent logic for evaluating systematically collected careful observations.
